site.json.title: More detail might be needed in some areas

pages.json.title: More detail might be needed in some areas
pages.json.content: Sub pages can be set up to provide additional content without adding to the list of tabs at the top of the page. These are nested using a simple parent child relationship.

sub-pages.json.content: Sub pages can be set up to provide additional content without adding to the list of tabs at the top of the page. These are nested using a simple parent child relationship.

example-subpage-02.title: Another example of the same type of information
example-subpage-02.content: Lots of really great but simple text.

example-sub-subpage-01.title: Probably not needed - more nesting
example-sub-subpage-01.content: As the relationships work on a simple parent child structure more and more pages can be nested as required.
